project.description: Nightly Build on Boot2Qt from internal git repositories

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash -x -e
cat > site.conf <<EOF BB_GIT_SHALLOW ?= "1" BB_GIT_SHALLOW_DEPTH ?= "1" # Usage in a recipe with multiple named uris or multiple named branches BB_GIT_SHALLOW_DEPTH_doc = ""
# u-boot-edm.bb SRCSERVER_pn-u-boot-edm = "git://10.20.30.20/volume1/internal_git/edm/uboot-imx-edm.git" SRCBRANCH_pn-u-boot-edm = "tn-imx_v2018.03_4.14.98_2.0.0_ga-wip" SRCOPTIONS_pn-u-boot-edm = ";protocol=ssh;user=rdsw" SRCREV_pn-u-boot-edm = "\${AUTOREV}" SRC_URI_pn-u-boot-edm = "\${SRCSERVER};branch=\${SRCBRANCH}\${SRCOPTIONS}"
# u-boot-script.bb #SRCSERVER_pn-u-boot-script = "git://10.20.30.20/volume1/internal_git/edm/uboot-imx-edm.git" #SRCOPTIONS_pn-u-boot-script = ";protocol=ssh;user=rdsw"
# linux-firmware-brcm-tn.bb SRCSERVER_pn-linux-firmware-brcm-tn = "git://10.20.30.20/volume1/internal_git/edm/brcm_firmware.git" SRCBRANCH_pn-linux-firmware-brcm-tn = "master" SRCOPTIONS_pn-linux-firmware-brcm-tn = ";protocol=ssh;user=rdsw" SRCREV_pn-linux-firmware-brcm-tn = "\${AUTOREV}" SRC_URI_pn-linux-firmware-brcm-tn = "\${SRCSERVER};branch=\${SRCBRANCH}\${SRCOPTIONS}" S_pn-linux-firmware-brcm-tn = "\${WORKDIR}/git"
# linux-firmware-qca-tn.bb SRCSERVER_pn-linux-firmware-qca-tn = "git://10.20.30.20/volume1/internal_git/edm/qca_firmware.git" SRCBRANCH_pn-linux-firmware-qca-tn = "caf-wlan/CNSS.LEA.NRT_3.0" SRCOPTIONS_pn-linux-firmware-qca-tn = ";protocol=ssh;user=rdsw" SRCREV_pn-linux-firmware-qca-tn = "\${AUTOREV}" SRC_URI_pn-linux-firmware-qca-tn = "\${SRCSERVER};branch=\${SRCBRANCH}\${SRCOPTIONS}" S_pn-linux-firmware-qca-tn = "\${WORKDIR}/git"
# linux-tn-imx.bb KERNEL_SRC_pn-linux-tn-imx = "git://10.88.88.8/volume1/internal_git/edm/tn-kernel.git" SRCBRANCH_pn-linux-tn-imx = "tn-imx_4.14.98_2.0.0_ga-wip" SRCOPTIONS_pn-linux-tn-imx = ";protocol=ssh;user=rdsw" SRCREV_pn-linux-tn-imx = "186c38d0e31d142be19592d2900a4dcb1da4b596" SRC_URI_pn-linux-tn-imx = "\${KERNEL_SRC};branch=\${SRCBRANCH}\${SRCOPTIONS}" # Remove the upstream history from our kernel repo, keeping our own BB_GIT_SHALLOW_REVS_pn-linux-tn-imx = "186c38d0e31d142be19592d2900a4dcb1da4b596" BB_GIT_SHALLOW_DEPTH_pn-linux-tn-imx = "" # Keep the branches in linux-tn-imx repositories BB_GIT_SHALLOW_TRIM_REFS_pn-linux-tn-imx = "0"
# afloader.bb TECHNEXION_GITHUB_MIRROR_pn-afloader = "git://10.20.30.20/volume1/internal_git/fpga/afloader.git" SRCOPTIONS_pn-afloader = ";protocol=ssh;user=rdsw" SRC_URI_pn-afloader = "\${TECHNEXION_GITHUB_MIRROR};branch=\${SRCBRANCH}\${SRCOPTIONS}"
# axonfabric-firmware.bb TECHNEXION_GITHUB_MIRROR_pn-axonfabric-firmware = "git://10.20.30.20/volume1/internal_git/fpga/axonfabric-firmware.git" SRCOPTIONS_pn-axonfabric-firmware = ";protocol=ssh;user=rdsw" SRC_URI_pn-axonfabric-firmware = "\${TECHNEXION_GITHUB_MIRROR};branch=\${SRCBRANCH}\${SRCOPTIONS}"
# imx-m4-demos-tn.bb SRCREV_pn-imx-m4-demos-tn = "d10b8dab12d6a34d79beae536ade455e6bbaacf2" M4_SRC_pn-imx-m4-demos-tn = "git://10.20.30.20:/volume1/internal_git/edm/imx-m4-demos-tn.git" SRCOPTIONS_pn-imx-m4-demos-tn = ";protocol=ssh;user=rdsw" SRC_URI_pn-imx-m4-demos-tn = "\${M4_SRC};branch=\${SRCBRANCH}\${SRCOPTIONS}"
EOF

#!/bin/bash -x -e
OUTDIR=/home/jenkins/build/boot2qt-images CACHEDIR=/home/jenkins/data/src/boot2qt/cache DLDIR=/home/jenkins/data/src/boot2qt/downloads SSTATEDIR=/home/jenkins/data/src/boot2qt/sstate-cache
# clear and make download/sstate-cache/ccache folder on external volume [ -L cache ] && rm -f cache [ -d ${CACHEDIR} ] && ln -s ${CACHEDIR} cache [ -L downloads ] && rm -f downloads [ -d ${DLDIR} ] && ln -s ${DLDIR} downloads [ -L sstate-cache ] && rm -f sstate-cache [ -d ${SSTATEDIR} ] && ln -s ${SSTATEDIR} sstate-cache [ -d ${WORKSPACE}/sources/meta-edm-bsp-release ] && rm -f -R ${WORKSPACE}/sources/meta-edm-bsp-release
# machine confs CONFs=("pico-imx8mq" "pico-imx8mm" "flex-imx8mm" "edm-imx8mq" "pico-imx7" "pico-imx6" "edm-imx7" "edm-imx6")
# setup environment variables for building # BASEBOARDs=("pi" "nymph" "dwarf" "hobbit") # DISPLAYs=("lvds7" "hdmi720p" "hdmi1080p" "lcd" "lvds7_hdmi720p") # WLANs=("qca" "brcm" "ath-pci" "all") setup_env_vars () { case $1 in pico-imx8mq) board="pi" disp="mipi5" wlan="qca" pan="ili9881c" ;; pico-imx8mm) board="pi" disp="mipi5" wlan="qca" pan="ili9881c" ;; edm-imx8mq) board="wizard" disp="mipi5" wlan="qca" pan="ili9881c" ;; flex-imx8mm) board="pi" disp="mipi5" wlan="qca" pan="ili9881c" ;; axon-imx8mm) board="pi" disp="mipi5" wlan="qca" pan="ili9881c" ;; pico-imx6) board="pi" disp="lcd" wlan="qca" pan="" ;; pico-imx7) board="pi" disp="lcd" wlan="qca" pan="" ;; pico-imx6ul) board="pi" disp="lcd" wlan="qca" pan="" ;; edm-imx6) board="fairy" disp="lvds7" wlan="qca" pan="" ;; axon-imx6) board="pi" disp="lcd" wlan="qca" pan="" ;; edm-imx7) board="gnome" disp="lcd" wlan="qca" pan="" ;; tep1-imx7) board="gnome" disp="lcd" wlan="ath-pci" pan="" ;; tep1-imx6ul) board="gnome" disp="lcd" wlan="ath-pci" pan="" ;; tek-imx6) board="tek" disp="lvds10" wlan="ath-pci" pan="" ;; tek3-imx6ul) board="tek" disp="lvds10" wlan="ath-pci" pan="" ;; *) ;; esac }
for conf in ${CONFs[*]}; do cd $WORKSPACE
./sources/meta-boot2qt/b2qt-init-build-env init --device $conf
export MACHINE=$conf source setup-environment.sh
# call setup_env_vars() to get our default values setup_env_vars $conf
# Copy the site.conf for overriding QCA firmware downloads cp $WORKSPACE/site.conf ./conf/site.conf
# Export uEnv.txt variables export BASE_BOARD=$board export DISPLAY_INFO=$disp export RF_FIRMWARES=$wlan export DISPLAY_PANEL=$pan export BB_ENV_EXTRAWHITE="$BB_ENV_EXTRAWHITE BASE_BOARD DISPLAY_INFO RF_FIRMWARES DISPLAY_PANEL"
# export out the conf and bitbake environment settings cat ./conf/local.conf cat ./conf/bblayers.conf cat ./conf/site.conf export
bitbake u-boot-edm -c cleanall bitbake linux-tn-imx -c cleanall bitbake b2qt-embedded-qt5-image -c cleanall bitbake b2qt-embedded-qt5-image # bitbake meta-toolchain-b2qt-embedded-qt5-sdk # SDKMACHINE=i686-mingw32 bitbake meta-toolchain-b2qt-embedded-qt5-sdk
done
